price: 4. Amaba ka badi, oo u akhri Qur’aanka si wanaagsan oo habboon.
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
